      • ensureTuplDbIsClosed

        public void ensureTuplDbIsClosed(java.io.File dbFile)
        Ensures that there is no open MapDB instance on the given file.

        This method assumes that the caller has asserted that there are no open transactions left on the MapDB instance. If there still are open transactions, an IllegalStateException will be thrown.

        Parameters:
        dbFile - The file to assert for that the corresponding MapDB instance is closed.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - Thrown if there are still open transactions on the MapDB that accesses the given file.

      • reloadChunksFromDisk

        public void reloadChunksFromDisk()
        Reloads all chunks from the hard drive, creating new BranchChunkManagers in the process.

        /!\ WARNING /!\
        This is a potentially dangerous operation that can threaten the ACID safety of operations. It should only be used during DB migrations or explicit maintenance periods! Use at your own risk!

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown()
